title: Asteroid Shooter
description: Basic Asteroid Shooter game written with pygame in OOP principals. Working collisions simple rotations of rectangles etc.

title: Frugger
description: Simple Street Crossig game cross the street and avoid being crashed by a car. Working hitboxes 2,5 dimmetnional effect music simple menus etc.

title: Western Shooter

title: Contra Like
description: 2D Contra like shooter with pretty background. Written in pygame.
